p: All homestead members aged over 5 years and not in third trimester pregnancy were invited to participate. Each participant was individually interviewed with a structured questionnaire that included questions regarding demographic data, health, and risk factors for zoonotic disease exposure. Age was collected in 5-year categories from 5 years of age. For the purposes of analysis these categories were recoded to make a continuous variable. The homestead head was asked a homestead-level questionnaire regarding animal ownership, wealth indicators, water source, and access to healthcare.
